channel.title: YCT on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in YCT on Yarra Framework

item.title: Client Tools 0.4
item.description: A new version of the Yarra Client Tools (YCT) has been released (version 0.4). Please replace old versions of the Yarra Client Tools with this latest release, as it contains improvements of the anonymization tool. The version is now available in the Download section.

item.title: Client Tools 0.3
item.description: A new version of the Yarra Client Tools (YCT) has been released (version 0.3). Please replace old versions of the Yarra Client Tools with this latest release, as it contains improvements of the anonymization tool. The version is now available in the Download section.
